txt.en: 'Luckily, the refugees should have made their way to safety. I fear that perhaps the cultists might be gathering them for use in a foul ritual. By returning them home, hopefully they will warn others to not be as careless.\n\n'Thank you not letting these folks fall into the cult's clutches.'

'[placeholder], several of our refugees went to go scavenge for supplies. While we have warned them of the dangers of going near Jâx Ugikh, they wished to be of some assistance. One of our scouts saw that they headed north towards Jâx Ugikh and we fear the worst.\n\n'Could you see if you can locate them and return them home safely?'
Several ambushed refugees have been lost near Jâx Ugikh.\n\nPlease aid them and return them home.
Talk to Azrât in Kên Taghlim
Several refugees have gone missing recently while exploring north of the settlement looking for supplies. Seek out the refugees and see if you can return them to their home.
Azrât is an archivist in Kên Taghlim and an aid to our cause. Seek her out and let her know about what is happening in Jâx Ugikh.
